# accessories

**Instance Property**

The collection of accessories in the room.

## Declaration

```swift
var accessories: [HMAccessory] { get }
```

## Discussion

You assign accessories to a room using the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHome/assignAccessory(_:to:completionHandler:)] method of [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHome].
title: accessories
